changeSet.author: emmanuel
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS routine_immunization ( id bigint NOT NULL DEFAULT nextval('covid_vaccination_id_seq'), uuid character varying(100), patient_id bigint, patient_uuid character varying(100), vaccine_type character varying(100), vaccine_detail character varying(100), vaccine_id bigint, missed_vaccine: character varying(100), missed_vaccine_type: character varying(100), vaccination_date date, archived int, PRIMARY KEY (id) );
